emailCollection.title: Email Address Collection
emailCollection.description: We collect email addresses for service provision, communication with customers, and important notifications. We will not provide email addresses to third parties without customer consent.

emailUsage.title: Email Address Usage
emailUsage.description:
We use collected email addresses for the following purposes:
- Important service notifications
- Account-related information
- Security alerts
- Product update information

dataHandling.title: Personal Information Handling
dataHandling.description: We manage and protect customer personal information in accordance with the law. We implement reasonable security measures against risks such as unauthorized access, loss, destruction, alteration, and leakage.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For questions or inquiries about personal information handling, please contact support@battdevy.com.

changes.title: Privacy Policy Changes
changes.description: We may update our privacy policy as necessary. For significant changes, we will announce them on our website or notify you via the registered email address.

serviceUsage.title: Service Usage
serviceUsage.description: BattDevy service is available only for personal and non-commercial purposes. Unauthorized use of the service or actions that infringe on other users' rights are strictly prohibited.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.description: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information and managing access to their account. Any unauthorized access or misuse must be reported to us immediately.

prohibitedActions.title: Prohibited Actions
list: Unauthorized use or intentional disruption of the service
Violation of other users' privacy or rights
Infringement of our intellectual property rights

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.description: All content, design, logos, and software of BattDevy belong to our company or our licensors. Users must respect these intellectual property rights and are prohibited from reproducing, distributing, or modifying them without authorization.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: We strive to provide continuous service, but we are not liable for direct or indirect damages resulting from service interruptions, errors, or security issues.

serviceModification.title: Service Modification and Termination
serviceModification.description: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or terminate all or part of the service for any reason. We will notify users as much as possible in advance.

changes.title: Terms of Service Changes
changes.description: We may update our terms of service as necessary. For significant changes, we will announce them on our website or notify you via the registered email address. Continued use of the service is considered acceptance of the latest terms of service.
